import React, { useState } from "react"; const Teacher = () => { const [Name, setName] = useState(""); const [Subject, setSubject] = useState(""); const [Timein, setTimein] = useState(""); const [Timeout, setTimeout] = useState(""); // Submit PPIC / ADD const Add = (event) => { if (!Name || !Subject || !Timein || !Timeout) { alert("Harap isi semua kolom!"); return; } const data = { Name: Name, Subject: Subject, Timein: Timein, Timeout: Timeout, }; fetch(`http://localhost:3001/api/post/schedule`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(data), }) .then((response) => { if (response.status === 200) { alert("Schedule Succesfully Updated"); window.location.reload(); } else { throw new Error("Error adding data"); } }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
